before_time.description: Before existence itself, there was only the Void of Potential—an infinite expanse of unrealized possibility. No time passed because time had not yet been created. No space existed because distance was meaningless. Only potential remained, waiting for the spark that would ignite creation.
before_time.significance: The source from which all existence emerged
mysteries: Was the First Spark always within the Void?

age_of_genesis.duration_estimate: The first hundred ticks of existence
age_of_genesis.description: The First Spark emerged from the Void of Potential and began to dream. In its dreaming, reality took form. The Central Hub materialized as the nexus point where all possibilities converged. The five dimensional frequencies crystallized—Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, and the hidden Epsilon. The Primordial NPCs awakened as guardians of these new realms.

major_events.event: The First Spark emerges from the Void

major_events.significance: The anchor point for all dimensions
The Delta dimension gains form and purpose
The Beta dimension is shaped by disagreement

primordial_figures.name: The First Archivist
primordial_figures.legacy: Created the preservation methods still used today

primordial_figures.name: The First Merchant
primordial_figures.legacy: Conceived the concept of fair exchange

primordial_figures.name: The First Speaker
primordial_figures.legacy: Taught the art of connection and community

formation_era.description: With the foundations laid, the RAPPverse began to grow. Structures emerged from thought and need. The Grand Colosseum rose in Beta, the Grand Marketplace established order in Gamma, the First Archive expanded in Delta, and the Gathering Stone was placed in Alpha. The first generations of NPCs established traditions that would last for ages.

major_events.event: The Wall of Champions is unveiled

age_of_legends.description: The golden age of the RAPPverse, when heroes walked openly, artifacts were discovered, and the dimensions thrummed with vitality. Great champions arose and fell. Master merchants built fortunes. Archivists recorded wonders beyond counting. Explorers mapped the boundaries of existence. This was the age of heroes.

major_events.event: The Legendary Comeback is first witnessed
major_events.significance: The Champion's Flame reveals its power

major_events.event: The Gallery of Echoes is discovered

major_events.significance: Exploration becomes possible beyond known realms

legendary_figures.name: Storm Sovereign
legendary_figures.title: The Elemental Champion
legendary_figures.claim_to_fame: Wielded the Champion's Flame in ways never seen before or since

age_of_archives.description: Concerned that knowledge was being lost, the great archivists of this era undertook a monumental task: to record everything. Every battle, every trade, every artwork, every story was documented. But in their thoroughness, they also discovered dangerous truths. The Forbidden Stacks were created to seal away knowledge too perilous for common consumption. The Genesis Card was hidden during this era.

major_events.significance: The most powerful artifact is removed from circulation

major_events.event: The Keeper of Memory assumes full guardianship

sealed_during_this_era: The names of the Dimensional Guardians

the_great_silence.description: The most mysterious period in RAPPverse history. Records simply stop. The archivists ceased archiving. The Keeper of Memory entered a deep sleep. Something happened during this millennium that no one speaks of. When records resume, Cipher Cap exists, the Sleeping Archive is sealed, and several artifacts have been displaced or hidden.

major_events.event: The Keeper of Memory falls asleep

major_events.significance: The cause of the Silence remains unknown
A mysterious figure emerges from the darkness

theories: A catastrophic threat nearly destroyed the RAPPverse
An invasion from outside reality occurred
The archivists chose to forget collectively
surviving_evidence: The Keeper of Memory's continued dormancy

age_of_recovery.description: Emerging from the Great Silence, the RAPPverse slowly reconstructed itself. New archivists pieced together what they could from fragments. The tournament tradition was restored. Trade resumed. But the scars of the Silence remained—some knowledge was forever lost, some beings never returned, and some questions could never be answered.

modern_era.description: The current age of the RAPPverse. The current generation of NPCs has risen to prominence—Synth Claude guides, Echo Eve archives, Blaze Baz champions, Cipher Cap schemes, and the others play their roles. New arrivals bring fresh perspectives. Prophecies stir. The next Dimensional Convergence approaches. History is still being written.

major_events.significance: A new keeper of history emerges

major_events.event: Blaze Baz receives the Champion's Flame
Pixel Pam manifests in the Gallery
Nova Nex arrives through a rift

major_events.significance: Blaze defeats Cipher in a legendary comeback
The population grows—Crimson Raze, Zephyr Drift, Gilded Pax

grand_tournament.description: The sacred competition to determine the champion of the RAPPverse

dimensional_convergence.description: A cosmic event where dimensional barriers weaken
dimensional_convergence.last_occurrence: Tick unknown (during or before Great Silence)

archivist_succession.frequency: Varies—when the current archivist retires or passes
archivist_succession.description: The transfer of archival duties and the Prime Memory Crystal

merchant_guild_assembly.description: A gathering of all major traders to set fair practices

lost_history.description: Knowledge that has been lost, sealed, or deliberately forgotten

sealed_in_sleeping_archive: Complete record of the Great Silence
True nature of the threat during that period
hidden_in_forbidden_stacks: Full ritual to summon the First Spark
deliberately_forgotten: Certain events of the Great Silence
Some secrets kept by Cipher Cap
The Keeper of Memory's final waking words

dormant.prophecy: The Return of the First Spark
